message: Friends are people that understand each other? Like us, navigating the ups and downs of a startup together?
Associates are people you meet but do not know...
Friends? Friends are people you exchange favors with. What are you going to do for me?
hey all (: whether we get in or not, I'd like to stay in touch. (: Who's in for staying on Convore to talk as we work on our startups?
Friends are people you exchange favors with... I'm thinking about that
If anyone wants to stay connected, go to www.LetsMakeAstartup.com and join the team of YC founders that want to work together to build a startup
@WatchPickWin_com haha "cavemen" that reminds me of an idea! Get someone (> 6'5 tall) to dress-up in a yeti costume and chase deer at a national park! A wooden club would be cool too!
